lines.name: Emma
lines.text: Alright then, one final room to test your stuff!

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: And one final tool to help you accomplish your mission.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: I created these noisemakers to distract guards that are in your way.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: Face where you want to set one down and [b]use an item[/b] (the R key) and select noisemaker to place it on the ground.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: The best part is, it completely disentigrates.  Not a trace left behind for guards to find!

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Well, the [i]best[/i] part is the explosion, but whatever.

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Now hurry up and get to the door so we can go eat lunch, alright?
